name: TerminalTerraria
tagline: A Terraria clone for the terminal. All credit goes to Re-Logic for the original game.
body:
### Terminal Terraria
Terminal Terraria is a clone of Terraria written in python for low level machines or computers that can't handle large amounts of graphic display. Please contribute to be recognized. All help is appreciated.

### Current Needs
Currently we need ANSI artists or ANSI art generators for converting original Terraria game art to ANSI art. All art will be credited to the creator and RE-Logic.

### Project Status
Currently we are working on making Terminal Terraria have the basic land generation. All progress will be charted soon.

### Authors and Contributors
Carson Katri (@CTKRocks)
Ryan Katri (@rkatri)

All other contributors will be listed here.

### Support or Contact
Want to contact me to find out how to contribute? Email me at carson.katri@gmail.com
Thanks for all your support in this project!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
